name: Potion Panic
description:
Potion Panic was initially created for the Global Game Jam 2016, and afterwards polished a bit. It's a local multiplayer game for 2 players. The goal for each player is to follow the instructions of your Master of Potions: collect 3 ingredients and throw them into your cauldron.

But each player can sabotage the other, by punching them, putting the wrong ingredients into their cauldron, or even bombing the last ingredient out of it. But be careful! Sabotaging your enemy will make the Potion Master angry, so try to do it when he looks away...

Features music by Roald Strauss.
